short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search the your Library's Catalogue at any moment without leaving your current page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin to search all the catalogs of all our resource sharing partners and Google Scholar in separate tabs. This plug-in is designed for Staff at the SWITCH Libraries to assist them in locating resources throughout SWITCH.
